entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness after midnight. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:33 AM CST Monday 3 April 2023
